changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.add_quest_item') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.add_quest_item GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.add_quest_item @account_id dbo.id_t, @character_id dbo.id_t, @item_id dbo.id_t, @quest_item_code dbo.code_t, @usable_count TINYINT, @quest_code dbo.code_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION
INSERT INTO dbo.Quest_Inventories (id, account_id, character_id, quest_item_code, usable_count, quest_code) VALUES (@item_id, @account_id, @character_id, @quest_item_code, @usable_count, @quest_code)
COMMIT END TRY BEGIN CATCH ROLLBACK END CATCH
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.add_quest_item') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.add_quest_item GO
